NK002(kha)004:0: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs bcu gcig zhal gyi bsgrub
NK002(kha)004:1: thabs bsnyung bar gnas pa dang 'brel ba'i cho ga
NK002(kha)004:2: gzhan phan 'od kyi d+r+wa ba zhes bya ba bzhugs
NK002(kha)004:3: so // na mo lo ki shwa ra ya /
NK002(kha)004:4: snying rje'i 'o mtshor 'khrungs pa'i zhal kho nas //
NK002(kha)004:5: ston mtshan zla ba'i dpal la rgol min yang //
NK002(kha)004:6: gang sku'i yid la shar bas srid nyon gyi //
NK002(kha)004:7: gdung bas pha mthar snyil byed mgon des skyong //
NK002(kha)004:8: de la re zhig 'phags mchog spyan ras gzigs kyi
NK002(kha)004:9: rigs sngags grub pa dge slong ma dpal mo'i lugs
NK002(kha)004:10: kyi 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas bsgom bzlas
NK002(kha)004:11: kyi cho ga nyams su blangs par bya ba la
NK002(kha)004:15: gnas khang byi dor byas la thugs rje chen po'i
NK002(kha)004:16: sku bris 'bur sogs rten gsum bkram pa'i steng du
NK002(kha)004:18: dmigs rten gyi dkyil 'khor ras sam /
NK002(kha)004:19: yang na man+dala lta bu'i steng du pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi lte ba dkar /
NK002(kha)004:25: byas pa'i dbus dang phyogs bzhir gtso 'khor gyi sku'am sa bon /
NK002(kha)004:26: ming yang lha'i kha dog dang mtshon gyi theg le dang tshom bu gang rung bkod /
NK002(kha)004:27: mthar chu gnyis nyer spyod lnga'i mchod pa rab brgya stong gang 'byor /
NK002(kha)004:28: tha na'ang gtso 'khor lnga la tshar re las mi
NK002(kha)004:29: nyung ba bshams pa'i mdun ngos su sha chang ma
NK002(kha)004:30: 'dres pa'i dkar gsum mngar gsum gyi rgyud las 'das
NK002(kha)004:31: gtor chos skyong 'byung po spyi gtor gsum ka zlum
NK002(kha)004:33: dkyil 'khor mdun du bum pa dkar po gtsang ma ras dkar po'i mgul mchings can /
NK002(kha)004:34: chu gtsang gi sum gnyis bkang ba bum rdzas nyer
NK002(kha)004:35: lnga btab la 'bras bu can gyi shing gi kha
NK002(kha)004:36: rgyan bcas me tog gi tshom bu'am 'dab brgyad kyi
NK002(kha)004:37: gdan la bkod / gnyis pa cho ga dngos la /
NK002(kha)004:41: khyad par sa ga zla ba lta bu'i nya stong
NK002(kha)004:42: sogs dus tshes khyad par can gyi snga nyin nas
NK002(kha)004:43: nam gyi dus su yan lag lnga khrus byas la
NK002(kha)004:44: / thog mar skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed pa ni /
NK002(kha)004:45: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog rnams la //
NK002(kha)004:47: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /
NK002(kha)004:48: ces dang tshad med bzhi ni /
NK002(kha)004:49: sems can thams cad bde ba dang bde ba'i rgyu dang ldan par gyur cig /
NK002(kha)004:51: de nas gso sbyongs len tshul bla ma dang rten la phyag gsum 'tshal nas /
NK002(kha)004:52: tshig brjod pas don dran pa'i sgo nas rjes zlos byed la /
NK002(kha)004:53: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
NK002(kha)004:54: ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
NK002(kha)004:55: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rta cang
NK002(kha)004:56: shes lta bu / glang po chen po /
NK002(kha)004:57: bya ba byas shing byed pa byas pa /
NK002(kha)004:59: rang gi don rjes su thob pa /
NK002(kha)004:60: srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa /
NK002(kha)004:62: legs pa rnams par grol ba'i thugs legs pa rnam par grol ba'i shes rab can /
NK002(kha)004:64: sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir dang /
NK002(kha)004:65: grol bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
NK002(kha)004:66: mu ge med par bya ba'i phyir dang /
NK002(kha)004:67: nad med par bya ba'i phyir dang /
NK002(kha)004:68: bla na med pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /
NK002(kha)004:69: gso sbyang nges par mdzad pa de bzhin du /
NK002(kha)004:70: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang /
NK002(kha)004:72: ji srid song nyi ma ma shar gyi bar du
NK002(kha)004:73: gso sbyang nges par yang dag par blangs bar bagyi'o
NK002(kha)004:75: dengs nas srog gcod mi bya zhing //
NK002(kha)004:76: gzhan gyi nor yang blangs mi bya //
NK002(kha)004:77: 'khrig pa'i chos kyang mi spyad cing //
NK002(kha)004:78: rdzun gyi tshig kyang mi smra'o //
NK002(kha)004:79: skyon ni mang po nyer bstan pa'i //
NK002(kha)004:80: chang ni yongs su spang bar bya //
NK002(kha)004:81: khri stan cher mtho mi bya zhing //
NK002(kha)004:82: de bzhin dus ma yin pa'i zas //
NK002(kha)004:83: dri dang phreng ba dang ni brgyan //
NK002(kha)004:84: gar dang glu sogs spangs bar bya //
NK002(kha)004:85: ji ltar dgra bcom rtags tu ni //
NK002(kha)004:86: srog gcod la sogs mi byed ltar //
NK002(kha)004:87: de bzhin srog gcod la sogs spangs //
NK002(kha)004:88: bla med byang chub myur thob shog /
NK002(kha)004:89: sdug bsngal mang 'khrul sems can rnams //
NK002(kha)004:90: srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog /
NK002(kha)004:95: ma h+aa shud+ha sat+wa pad+ma b+hi b+h+au shi ta b+hu dzah d+ha ra d+ha ra /
NK002(kha)004:96: sa man+ta a wa lo ki te h'u phata s+w+aa h+aa /
NK002(kha)004:97: lan gsum gyi rjes zlos kyi sna drangs te tshar nyer gcig bazla'o //
NK002(kha)004:98: khrims kyi tshul khrims skyon med cing //
NK002(kha)004:99: tshul khrims rnam par dag dang ldan //
NK002(kha)004:100: rloms sems med pa'i tshul khrims kyis //
NK002(kha)004:101: tshul khrims pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /
NK002(kha)004:103: gnyis pa dngos gzhi sngar gyi /
NK002(kha)004:104: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog rnams la //
NK002(kha)004:106: skyabs 'gro dang sems bskyed dang tshad med bzhi lan gsum re brjod nas /
NK002(kha)004:107: yo byad byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
NK002(kha)004:109: thams cad stong nyid nam mkha'i ngang //
NK002(kha)004:110: b+h+r+aum las rin chen snod nang du //
NK002(kha)004:111: las phyi nang mchod pa'i tshogs //
NK002(kha)004:112: so so'i lha mo'i rol par bcas //
NK002(kha)004:113: rab 'byams nam mkha' gang bar gyur //
NK002(kha)004:116: shab+da'i bar so so'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa byin gyis brlabs /
NK002(kha)004:117: de nas tshogs zhing spyan 'dren pa ni /
NK002(kha)004:118: bla ma thugs rje chen po la //
NK002(kha)004:119: sangs rgyas byang sems rtsa ba gsum //
NK002(kha)004:120: chos skyong 'khor bcas sprin dpung bzhin //
NK002(kha)004:121: mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs gyur //
NK002(kha)004:122: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku //
NK002(kha)004:144: man+dala tshom bu rgyas par bkod la /
NK002(kha)004:149: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la sogs
NK002(kha)004:150: te phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang
NK002(kha)004:151: chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol
NK002(kha)004:152: / bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i tshe 'khor ba
NK002(kha)004:153: thog ma med pa nas da ltar la thug gis
NK002(kha)004:154: / bar du / nyon mongs pa 'dod chags dang /
NK002(kha)004:157: lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas sdig pa mi dge ba bcu bgyis pa dang /
NK002(kha)004:158: mtshams med pa lnga bgyis pa dang /
NK002(kha)004:159: de dang nye ba lnga bgyis pa dang /
NK002(kha)004:160: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa dang 'gal ba dang /
NK002(kha)004:161: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dang 'gal ba dang /
NK002(kha)004:162: gsang sngags kyi dam tshig dang 'gal ba dang /
NK002(kha)004:163: pha dang ma la ma gus pa dang /
NK002(kha)004:164: mkhan po dang slob dpon la ma gus pa dang /
NK002(kha)004:165: grogs tshangs par mtshungs par spyod par rnams la ma gus pa dang /
NK002(kha)004:166: dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa'i las bgyis pa dang /
NK002(kha)004:167: dam pa'i chos spangs pa dang /
NK002(kha)004:168: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bskur pa btab pa dang /
NK002(kha)004:169: sems can gnod pa'i las bgyis pa la sogs pa
NK002(kha)004:170: sdig pa mi dge ba'i tshogs bdag gis bgyis pa
NK002(kha)004:171: dang / bgyid du rtsal ba dang /
NK002(kha)004:172: gzhan gyis bgyis pa la rjes su yi rang ba sogs /
NK002(kha)004:173: mdor na mtho ris dang thar pa'i gegs su gyur cing /
NK002(kha)004:174: 'khor ba dang ngan song gi rgyur gyur pa'i nyes
NK002(kha)004:175: ltung gi tshogs ci bgyis pa thams cad bla ma
NK002(kha)004:176: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la sogs te phyogs
NK002(kha)004:177: bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
NK002(kha)004:178: dpa' thams cad kyi spyan sngar mthol lo bshags so
NK002(kha)004:181: phyin chad sdom par bgyid lags so //
NK002(kha)004:188: mya ngan mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa /
NK002(kha)004:189: dge ba bsngo ba'i yan lag rnams ni /
NK002(kha)004:190: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun sogs /
NK002(kha)004:193: de nas tshogs zhing rnams rang gnas su gshegs par bsam /
NK002(kha)004:194: bdag bskyed dang mdun bskyed rim pa ni /
NK002(kha)004:196: s+w+aa b+h+aa was stong par sbyangs /
NK002(kha)004:197: stong pa'i ngang las pam las pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi
NK002(kha)004:198: lte bar +aahls zla ba'i steng du h+r+aihyiga 'od kyi
NK002(kha)004:199: 'phro 'dus las gser gyi pad+ma'i lte bar h+r+aihs mtshan
NK002(kha)004:200: pa de las 'od zer lcags kyu dang zhags pa
NK002(kha)004:201: lta bu dpag tu med pa 'phros sangs rgyas dang
NK002(kha)004:202: byang sems thams cad la thim pa yongs su gyur
NK002(kha)004:203: pa las / rang nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
NK002(kha)004:204: ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba zhal bcu gcig
NK002(kha)004:205: gi rtsa ba'i zhal dkar ba /
NK002(kha)004:208: de'i steng gi zhal gsum ljang dmar dkar ba /
NK002(kha)004:209: de'i steng gi zhal gsum dmar dkar ljang ba /
NK002(kha)004:210: de rnams zhi ba'i zhal sgegs pa'i rnam pa can /
NK002(kha)004:211: de'i steng khro bo'i zhal nag mo skra ser po gyen du bardzesa pa /
NK002(kha)004:212: de'i steng du sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhal dmar po gtsug gtor dang bcas pa /
NK002(kha)004:213: rtsa ba'i phyag dang po gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyar ba /
NK002(kha)004:215: gsum pas mchog sbyin gyi mthil nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun babs pas yi dwags kyi bkres skom sel ba /
NK002(kha)004:217: g.yon gnyis pas pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa /
NK002(kha)004:218: gsum pas ril ba spyi blugs /
NK002(kha)004:219: bzhi pas mda' gzhu bsnams pa /
NK002(kha)004:220: phyag lhag ma dgu brgya dang dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya rnam par brkyang ba /
NK002(kha)004:221: phyag thams cad kyi mthil nas spyan re re dang bcas pa /
NK002(kha)004:222: zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i stabs kyis bzhengs shing ras gsar
NK002(kha)004:223: pa'i sham thabs dang ri dwags kyi lpags pas nu
NK002(kha)004:225: rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par spras pa /
NK002(kha)004:226: mtshan dpe yongs su rtsogs pa 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phro ba'i sku can /
NK002(kha)004:227: dpral ba moh mgrin par +aah thugs kar h'uh thugs
NK002(kha)004:228: ka'i dbus su zla ba'i steng du h+r+aihde las 'od
NK002(kha)004:229: zer 'phros / rang bzhin gyis gnas dang /
NK002(kha)004:230: lho phyogs po ta la nas 'phags pa spyan ras
NK002(kha)004:231: gzigs la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
NK002(kha)004:232: cad kyis bskor ba badz+ra sa ma dzahs spyan drangs
NK002(kha)004:233: / sarba ta tha ga ta a wa lo gi te ar+g+ham pra tits+tsha s+w+aa h+aa nas /
NK002(kha)004:235: yang 'od 'phros dbang lha rigs lnga badz+ra sa ma dzasa spyan drangs /
NK002(kha)004:239: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag la dbang bskur du gsol /
NK002(kha)004:242: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni /
NK002(kha)004:250: rna ltag g.yon pa don 'grub kyi dbu rgyan par gyur /
NK002(kha)004:252: rang gi snying ga'i h+r+aiyig gi mthar gzungs sngags gsal btab ste /
NK002(kha)004:253: gzungs bzlas pas de'i 'od zer gyis mdud du bzhugs
NK002(kha)004:254: pa'i sangs rgyas byang sems thams cad kyi thugs rgyud
NK002(kha)004:255: bskul / sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs rnams 'od zer gyi rnams pa phyir 'phros /
NK002(kha)004:256: rang gi spyi bo nas zhugs snying gis gzungs sngags la thim /
NK002(kha)004:257: slar 'od zer gong ltar 'phros pas mdun gyi ye
NK002(kha)004:258: shes sems dpa'i thugs nas 'od zer dpag tu med
NK002(kha)004:259: pa 'phros / sems can thams cad kyi sdig sgrib sbyangs /
NK002(kha)004:261: tshul 'dus rang gi snying ga'i h+r+aihl thim par gyur /
NK002(kha)004:263: na mo rat+na tra ya y+aa /
NK002(kha)004:264: na mo ar+ya dz+ny+aa na sa ga ra /
NK002(kha)004:265: bee ro tsa na b+hu ha ra dza ya /
NK002(kha)004:268: na ma sarba ta th+aa ga ta b+h+yah ar+ha te
NK002(kha)004:269: b+h+yah samyak+sam b+hud+he b+h+ya na ma at+ya a wa lo
NK002(kha)004:273: ma h+aa ka ru ni ka ya /
NK002(kha)004:280: pra tsa le pra tsa le /
NK002(kha)004:281: ku su me ku su me wa re /
NK002(kha)004:282: i li mi li tsi ti dz+w+aa la ma pa na ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK002(kha)004:283: zhes gzungs ring tshar gcig tad+ya tha man chad brgya dang bdun bazla'o //
NK002(kha)004:284: mi shes pa rnams kyi yig drug stong phrag las mi nyung bar bazla'o //
NK002(kha)004:285: bdag bskyed bzlas pa grub pa rnams mdun gyi ye shes pa la /
NK002(kha)004:287: dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa sogs kyis bstod cing yi ge brgya ba'i bzod gsol rnams byed la /
NK002(kha)004:288: badz+ra mus gshegs gsol byas la /
NK002(kha)004:289: rang nyid spyan ras gzigs zhal gcig phyag gnyis par gyur /
NK002(kha)004:290: ces bdag bskyed zhal phyag thams cad bsdus te zhal
NK002(kha)004:291: gcig phyag gnyis g.yas mchog sbyin g.yon gser gyi pad
NK002(kha)004:293: de nas mdun bskyed bya ba ni /
NK002(kha)004:295: stong pa'i ngang las rang gi snying ga'i h+r+aihls b+h+r+aum
NK002(kha)004:296: chad de mdun bskyed kyi gnas su babs pa las
NK002(kha)004:297: / gzhal med khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa /
NK002(kha)004:298: mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbus su
NK002(kha)004:299: pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte ba phyogs bzhir zla
NK002(kha)004:301: dbus su h+r+aihyiga dkar po yongs su gyur pa las
NK002(kha)004:302: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs ston ka'i zla ba ltar
NK002(kha)004:303: dkar ba / zhal bcu gcig gi rtsa zhal dkar ba /
NK002(kha)004:306: de'i steng gi zhal gsum ljang dkar ba /
NK002(kha)004:307: de'i steng gi zhal gsum dmar dkar ljang ba /
NK002(kha)004:308: de rnams zhi ba'i zhal sgegs pa'i rnam pa can /
NK002(kha)004:309: de'i steng du khro bo'i zhal nag po skra ser po gyen du bardzesa pa /
NK002(kha)004:310: de'i steng du sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhal dmar po gtsug gtor dang bcas pa /
NK002(kha)004:311: rtsa ba'i phyag dang po gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyar ba /
NK002(kha)004:313: gsum pas mchog sbyin gyi mthil nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun babs pas yi dwags kyi bkres skom sel ba /
NK002(kha)004:315: g.yon gnyis pas pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa /
NK002(kha)004:316: gsum pas ril ba spyi blugs /
NK002(kha)004:317: bzhi pas mda' gzhu bsnams pa /
NK002(kha)004:318: phyag lhag ma dgu brgya dang dgu cu rtsa gnyis mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya rnam par brkyang ba /
NK002(kha)004:319: phyag thams cad kyi mthil nas spyan re re dang bcas pa /
NK002(kha)004:320: zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i stabs kyi bzhengs shing ras gsar ba'i shams thabs dang /
NK002(kha)004:321: ri dwags kyi lpags pas nu ma g.yon pa bkab pa /
NK002(kha)004:322: rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par spras pa /
NK002(kha)004:323: mtshan dpe yongs su rdzogs pa 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phro ba'i sku can /
NK002(kha)004:324: de'i dbu gtsug tu sangs rgyas 'od dpag med dmar po mnyam bzhag gi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
NK002(kha)004:325: shar du h'u las mi bskyod pa sngon po sa gnon gyi phyag rgya can /
NK002(kha)004:326: lhor tram las rin chen 'byung ldan ser po mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya can /
NK002(kha)004:327: nub tu las rnam snang dkar po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can /
NK002(kha)004:328: byang du +aa las don yod grub pa ljang gu skyabs sbyin gyi phyag rgya can /
NK002(kha)004:329: gshegs pa gzhan gsum g.yon mnyam bzhag mdzad pa /
NK002(kha)004:330: thams cad kyang rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs
NK002(kha)004:331: shing sangs rgyas rab tu byung ba'i cha lugs can
NK002(kha)004:332: no // mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi bum pa bzhir grub par gyur /
NK002(kha)004:333: de nas gnas gsum byin gyis rlabs pa dang /
NK002(kha)004:335: lha des thams cad kyi dpral ba /
NK002(kha)004:337: thugs ka'i dbus su zla ba'i steng du h+r+aihde las 'od zer 'phros pas rang bzhin gyi gnas dang /
NK002(kha)004:338: lho phyogs po ta la nas 'phags pa spyan ras
NK002(kha)004:339: gzigs la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
NK002(kha)004:340: cad kyis bskor ba badz+ra sa ma dzahs spyan drangs
NK002(kha)004:341: / sarba ta th+aa ga ta ar+ya a wa lo ki te ar+g+ham /
NK002(kha)004:345: dzahmh'u bam hoh dam tshig pa dang gnyis su med
NK002(kha)004:346: par gyur yang 'od 'phros dbang lha rigs lnga badz+ra
NK002(kha)004:347: sa ma dzahs spyan 'dren pa ni /
NK002(kha)004:348: ar+g+ham nas shab+da'i bar gyis mchod /
NK002(kha)004:349: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag la dbang bskur du gsol /
NK002(kha)004:355: de nas mchod pa 'bul ba la /
NK002(kha)004:357: a mri te h'u phata kyis bsangs /
NK002(kha)004:359: stong pa'i ngang las rin po che'i snod yangs shing
NK002(kha)004:360: rgya che ba rnams kyi nang du zhu ba las
NK002(kha)004:368: rol mo rnams dngas zhing thogs pa med pa 'phags
NK002(kha)004:369: pa kun tu bzang po'i rnam par thar pa las
NK002(kha)004:370: byung ba'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis phung po lta bu
NK002(kha)004:373: shab+da +aahmh'u badz+ra spa ra na khamh de nas 'bul ba ni /
NK002(kha)004:374: rab 'byams rgya mtsho dpag med na //
NK002(kha)004:375: mchod yon ji snyed yod pa dang //
NK002(kha)004:376: bdag gi gus pas bshams pa 'di //
NK002(kha)004:377: rgyal ba sras dang bcas la 'bul //
NK002(kha)004:378: sarba ta th+aa ga ta sa p+aa ri wa ra
NK002(kha)004:379: ar+g+ham pra ti ts+tsha s+w+aa h+aah rab 'byams rgya mtsho
NK002(kha)004:380: zhab bsil bdag gis rgyal ba sarba ta th+aa ga
NK002(kha)004:381: ta sa p+aa ri wa ra pad+yam rab 'byams rgya
NK002(kha)004:382: mtsho me tog bdag gi rgyal ba sarba ta th+aa
NK002(kha)004:383: ga ta sa pa ri wa ra push+pe rab 'byams
NK002(kha)004:384: bdug spos bdag gi rgyal ba sarba ta tha ga
NK002(kha)004:385: ta d+hu pe pra tits+tsha s+w+aa h+aa /
NK002(kha)004:386: rab 'byams rgya snang gsal bdag gi rgyal ba sarba
NK002(kha)004:387: ta th+aa ga ta sa p+aa ri wa ra a
NK002(kha)004:388: lo ke rab 'byams dri chab bdag gi rgyal ba
NK002(kha)004:389: sarba ta tha ga ta sa p+aa ri wa ra
NK002(kha)004:390: gan+d+he rab 'byams zhal zas bdag ni rgyal ba sarba
NK002(kha)004:391: ta th+aa ga ta sa p+aa ri wa ra nee
NK002(kha)004:392: we d+ya rab 'byams rol mo bdag gi rgyal ba
NK002(kha)004:393: sarba ta th+aa ga ta sa pa ri wa ra
NK002(kha)004:395: zhes so so'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas mchod la man+dala rgyas par 'bul lo //
NK002(kha)004:397: phyag stong 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sogs /
NK002(kha)004:398: chos sku nam mkha' gzugs sku thabs dang rigs lnga de nas bzlas dmigs ni /
NK002(kha)004:399: bdag mdun gnyis ka'i phyag mdzub las bdud rtsi'i rgyun
NK002(kha)004:400: bab pas bum pa ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i chus
NK002(kha)004:401: gang bar gyur / na mo rat+na tra ya ya /
NK002(kha)004:402: na mo ar+ya dz+ny+aa na sa sogs /
NK002(kha)004:403: ma pa na ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK002(kha)004:404: gzungs ring brgya rtsa gcig bzla zhing phyag 'tshal zhing bstod pa bya ba ni /
NK002(kha)004:405: rang gi spyi bor pad zla'i steng du dge slong
NK002(kha)004:406: ma dpal mo rab tu byung ba'i cha byad can
NK002(kha)004:407: phyag gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyar te ngo chen
NK002(kha)004:408: mdzad par gyur / de ltar bsam pa dang /
NK002(kha)004:409: rang gzhan sems can thams cad kyi lus grangs med du sprul nas phyag 'tshal /
NK002(kha)004:410: ngag gi bstod pa dag par brjod la /
NK002(kha)004:411: yid kyi dad pa drag po'i sgo nas //
NK002(kha)004:412: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)004:413: 'jig rten bla ma srid pa gsum gyis bstod pa po //
NK002(kha)004:414: lha yi gtso bo dud dang tshangs pas bstod pa po //
NK002(kha)004:415: thub pa'i rgyal mchog bstod pas grub par mdzad pa po //
NK002(kha)004:416: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)004:417: bde gshegs dpag med sku bzang 'dzin pa po //
NK002(kha)004:418: bde gshegs snang ba mtha' yas dbu rgyan 'dzin pa po //
NK002(kha)004:419: phyag g.yas mchog sbyin yi dwags bkres skom sel ba po //
NK002(kha)004:420: phyag g.yon gser gyi pad+mas rnam par brgyan pa po //
NK002(kha)004:421: dri zhim ral pa'i phreng ba dmar ser 'khyug pa po //
NK002(kha)004:422: zhal ras rgyas pa zla ba lta bur mdzes pa po //
NK002(kha)004:423: spyan gyi pad+ma mchog tu bzang zhing yangs pa po //
NK002(kha)004:424: kha ba dung ltar rnam dkar dri ngad ldan pa po //
NK002(kha)004:425: dri med 'od chags mu tig tshom bu 'dzin pa po //
NK002(kha)004:426: mdzes pa'i 'od zer skya rengs dmar pos brgyan pa po //
NK002(kha)004:427: pad+ma'i mtsho ltar phyag ni dngar bar byas pa po //
NK002(kha)004:428: ston ka'i sprin gyi mdog dang ldan zhing gzhon pa po //
NK002(kha)004:429: rin chen mang pos dpung pa gnyis ni brgyan pa po //
NK002(kha)004:430: lo ma'i mchog ltar phyag mthil gzhon zhing 'jam pa po //
NK002(kha)004:431: ri dwags lpags pas nu ma g.yon pa bkab pa po //
NK002(kha)004:432: snyan cha gdu bus sgegs cing rgyan rnams 'chang ba po //
NK002(kha)004:433: dri ma med pa pad+ma'i mchog la gnas pa po //
NK002(kha)004:434: lte ba'i ngos ni pad+ma'i 'dab ltar 'jam pa po //
NK002(kha)004:435: gser gyi ske rag mchog ni nor bus spras pa po //
NK002(kha)004:436: sta zur dkris pa'i ras bzang sham thabs 'dzin pa po //
NK002(kha)004:437: thub pa'i mkhyen mchog mtsho chen pha rol phyin pa po //
NK002(kha)004:438: mchog brnyes bsod nams mang pos nye bar bsags pa'o //
NK002(kha)004:439: rtag tu bde ba'i 'byung gnas rga nad sel ba po //
NK002(kha)004:440: gsum mthar mdzad cing mkha' spyod spyod pas ston pa po //
NK002(kha)004:441: lus can mchog ste bdud dpung 'khrugs las rgyal ba po //
NK002(kha)004:442: gser gyi rkang gdub sgra yis zhabs yid 'ong ba po //
NK002(kha)004:443: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi yi dben par mdzad pa po //
NK002(kha)004:444: ngang pa'i 'gros 'dra glang chen dred ltar gshegs pa po //
NK002(kha)004:445: yongs rdzogs nye bar bsags shing bstan pa gnyer ba po //
NK002(kha)004:446: 'o ma'i mtsho dang chu yi mtsho las sgrol ba po //
NK002(kha)004:447: gang zhig rtag tu tho rangs langs nas gus pa yis //
NK002(kha)004:448: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yid la sems byed cing //
NK002(kha)004:449: bstod pa'i mchog 'dis dag cing gsal bar bstod byed na //
NK002(kha)004:450: de ni skyes pa'am ni bud med yin yang rung //
NK002(kha)004:451: skye ba 'adi'am ma 'ongs skye ba thams cad du //
NK002(kha)004:452: 'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das dgongs pa kun 'grub 'gyur //
NK002(kha)004:453: zhes phyag dang bcas pas bstod pa tshar nyer gcig bya'o //
NK002(kha)004:454: gsum pa rjes kyi rim pa la /
NK002(kha)004:456: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang dang //
NK002(kha)004:457: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas kun //
NK002(kha)004:458: dengs 'dir bdag la dgongs su gsol //
NK002(kha)004:459: phan bde'i 'byung gnas bde gshegs kyi //
NK002(kha)004:460: bstan pa dar zhing rgyas pa dang //
NK002(kha)004:461: bstan pa'i rtsa lag bshes gnyen rnams //
NK002(kha)004:463: mtha' yas skye dgu ma lus kun //
NK002(kha)004:464: bde zhing dam pa'i chos la spyod //
NK002(kha)004:465: byams dang snying rje'i sems 'byangs zhing //
NK002(kha)004:467: ji ltar ji snyed shes rab che //
NK002(kha)004:468: rgyud la skye bar byin gyis rlobs //
NK002(kha)004:471: 'das ma 'das kyi gtor ma byin gyis rlabs pa ni /
NK002(kha)004:472: badz+ra a mri ta sogs kyis bsangs /
NK002(kha)004:473: s+w+aa b+h+aa wa sogs kyi stong par sbyangs /
NK002(kha)004:474: stong pa'i ngang las b+h+r+aum las rin po che'i snod
NK002(kha)004:475: yangs shing rgya che ba rnams kyi nang du 'od
NK002(kha)004:476: du zhu ba las byung ba'i gtor ma zag pa
NK002(kha)004:477: med pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen
NK002(kha)004:480: thog mar rtsa gsum sangs rgyas byang sems sogs la 'bul ba ni /
NK002(kha)004:482: sogs snying po lan gsum brjod do //
NK002(kha)004:483: mchod sbyin gtor ma rgya chen 'di //
NK002(kha)004:484: bla ma rnams dang dkyil 'khor lha //
NK002(kha)004:485: sangs rgyas byang sems tshogs la 'bul //
NK002(kha)004:486: mchog thun dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK002(kha)004:487: gnyis pa mkha' 'gro chos skyong sogs la 'bul ba ni /
NK002(kha)004:488: a ka ro mu kham sarba d+harma nam ad+ya nut+pan+na tod ta +aah'u phata s+w+aa h+aa /
NK002(kha)004:490: mkha' 'gro chos skyong srung ma'i tshogs //
NK002(kha)004:491: 'dir gshegs mchod sbyin gtor ma bzhes //
NK002(kha)004:492: dam chos bsgrubs pa'i 'gal rkyen rnams //
NK002(kha)004:493: zhi zhing mthun rkyen lhun grub mdzod //
NK002(kha)004:494: gsum pa sde brgyad sogs gzhi bdag spyi la 'bul ba ni /
NK002(kha)004:497: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)004:498: de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs mdzes dam de bzhin gshegs
NK002(kha)004:499: pa sku 'jam klas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa
NK002(kha)004:500: thams dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)004:501: gzhi bdag la sogs mthu ldan sde brgyad rnams //
NK002(kha)004:502: 'dod yon lnga ldan mchod gtor 'di bzhes la //
NK002(kha)004:503: bstan dar bdag sogs 'gal rkyen kun zhing zhing //
NK002(kha)004:504: chos ldan bsam don yid bzhin 'grub par mdzod //
NK002(kha)004:506: de nas me long ngos la lha yi gzugs brnyan shar ba la bum chus khrus bya ba ni /
NK002(kha)004:507: 'gro ba'i sgron me spyan ras gzigs dbang la //
NK002(kha)004:508: dri zhim bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis khrus gsol bas //
NK002(kha)004:509: 'gro ba'i sgrib gnyis dri ma kun bsal nas //
NK002(kha)004:510: dri bral sku gsum brnyes pa'i sa thob shog /
NK002(kha)004:512: spro na sku phyi ba dang na bza' 'bul ba'i sho lo ka gnyis brjod /
NK002(kha)004:513: de dag med rung cha da skyon med do //
NK002(kha)004:515: skye zhing skye ba dag ni thams cad du //
NK002(kha)004:516: rigs bzang blo gsol nga rgyal med pa dang //
NK002(kha)004:517: snying rje che zhing spyan ras gzigs kyi dam tshig la gnas shog /
NK002(kha)004:520: ma rnyed yongs su ma tshags dang //
NK002(kha)004:521: gang yang nus 'dir ni bgyis de kun khyod kyis bzod pa gsol //
NK002(kha)004:522: pad+ma sa t+wa sa ma ya /
NK002(kha)004:525: rang la khrus gsol tshe sngar gyi bum pa spyi bor thogs la /
NK002(kha)004:526: ma ni pad+me h'u zhes brjod /
NK002(kha)004:527: 'phags pa thugs rje chen po gtso 'khor gsum rang gi mdun gyi nam mkhar byon //
NK002(kha)004:528: sku'i cha las bdud rtsi dkar po'i rgyun babs //
NK002(kha)004:529: rang gi lus phyi nang bar gsum thams cad bkrus
NK002(kha)004:530: pas sgo gyi nad gdon sdig sgrib bag chags dang
NK002(kha)004:531: bcas thams cad lhag ma med par dag par gyur
NK002(kha)004:536: gsum pas skye med chos sku rtogs par bsam zhing gtso 'khor gsum po rang la thim par bsgom /
NK002(kha)004:537: dge ba 'di yi thugs rje 'gro ba de yi sa la 'god par shog /
NK002(kha)004:539: thun bar rnams su'ang lha'i nga rgya gyi ngang yig
NK002(kha)004:540: drug dang gzungs sogs las 'bad pa gal che ba
NK002(kha)004:541: yin no // sbyor dngos gnyis la thun gsum pa'i
NK002(kha)004:542: 'jug dang rjes chog bcas kyi mtha' bsngo smon rgyas
NK002(kha)004:543: yin no // pa ni / thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur sogs /
NK002(kha)004:544: sems can rnams la phan pa mang bgyis shog /
NK002(kha)004:545: de nas bkra shis brjod pa ni /
NK002(kha)004:546: nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs //
NK002(kha)004:547: nyin mo'i gung yang bde legs shing //
NK002(kha)004:548: nyin mtshan rtag tu bde legs pa //
NK002(kha)004:549: dkon mchog gsum gyi dengs 'dir rtsol //
NK002(kha)004:550: dpal ldan bla mas dengs yi dam lha yi chos
NK002(kha)004:551: skyong srung gzhi bdag rnams 'byung po gang dag 'dir
NK002(kha)004:553: sa'am 'on te bar snang 'khod kyang rung //
NK002(kha)004:554: skye rgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing //
NK002(kha)004:555: nyin dang mtshan du chos la spyod par shog /
NK002(kha)004:556: 'dir ni rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis //
NK002(kha)004:557: shin tu bden par gsungs zhing rdzun med pa //
NK002(kha)004:558: bden pa des kyang rtags tu bde legs shog /
NK002(kha)004:559: de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig /
NK002(kha)004:560: sogs kyi mtha' brgyan par bya'o //
NK002(kha)004:561: yang rjes mchog mjug tu bdag khrus kyi rjes /
NK002(kha)004:563: 'dir ni gzugs dang lhan cig tu sogs kyi rten bzhugs bya zhing /
NK002(kha)004:565: khyed kyis sems can don kun sogs kyi ye shes pa gshegs /
NK002(kha)004:566: dam tshig pa rang la bstim mo //
NK002(kha)004:567: spyir ni 'don 'grigs dang lag len bya tshul ni /
NK002(kha)004:568: bsnyungs gnas gcig las mi byed tshe /
NK002(kha)004:569: nyin dang po sbyor ba la cho ga gsum /
NK002(kha)004:570: dang po nam langs lag ris mthong tshe yan lag lnga khrus dang gso sbyang blang ngo //
NK002(kha)004:572: de nas skyabs 'gro nas bsngo smon bsdus pa'i bar grub nas /
NK002(kha)004:573: nyin gung nges pa la sha chang rgog pa la
NK002(kha)004:574: phug sran ma sogs ma yin zas la gung tshig
NK002(kha)004:575: byas la khrus song bya rjes thun mtshams rnams su
NK002(kha)004:576: ja btung chog / thun la zhugs nas thun mtshams kyi bar du btung pa spongs /
NK002(kha)004:577: cho ga dang gzungs kyi rgyun mi bcad thun gnyis
NK002(kha)004:578: pa la gso sbyangs mi dgos ma rtogs skyabs 'gro
NK002(kha)004:579: nas bzung bsngo smon bsdus pa'i bar sngar dang 'dra
NK002(kha)004:580: / thun gsum pa la thun gnyis pa ji bzhin las bsngo smon rgyas pa dang bkra shis brjod /
NK002(kha)004:581: gnyid du 'gro khar rang nyid thugs rje chen po
NK002(kha)004:582: 'od du zhu nas thugs ka'i h+r+aihl thim h+r+aihyanga 'od
NK002(kha)004:583: du zhu nas rang bzhin stong pa'i ngang las mnyam
NK002(kha)004:584: bzhag gi gnyid du 'gro bar bya /
NK002(kha)004:585: de ltar mi lcogs na lha dang bla ma la
NK002(kha)004:586: gus pa yang yang ngang las gnyid logs pas dgos
NK002(kha)004:587: pa khyad par can yod do //
NK002(kha)004:588: nyin gnyis pa dngos gzhi la yang sngar nub nyal
NK002(kha)004:589: nas bzung ngag bcad pa'i mur ngag mi btang bar
NK002(kha)004:590: nas lang pa dang mnyam du /
NK002(kha)004:591: yan lag lnga khrus gso sbyangs len pa nas bzung
NK002(kha)004:592: thun gsum ka gcod tshul nyin snga ma ji lta
NK002(kha)004:593: ba bzhin las / bza' btung rdul cha tsam yang
NK002(kha)004:594: mi btang ma zad bum chu khong du mi btang
NK002(kha)004:595: bar smra bcad byed pa rnams khyad par ro //
NK002(kha)004:596: nyin gsum pa rjes chog la /
NK002(kha)004:597: lag ris mthong ba'i dus su thog mar lus kyi srin bu la phan phyir /
NK002(kha)004:598: thug pa sla mo zhig btang nas ngag grol /
NK002(kha)004:599: de nas gso sbyang mi dgos zhing /
NK002(kha)004:600: skyabs sems nas bzung bsngo smon bsdus pa'i bar song rjes /
NK002(kha)004:601: 'og gi brten bzhugs gshegs gsol gang 'os kyi mjug
NK002(kha)004:602: tu thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis ma'i bsngo smon
NK002(kha)004:603: rgyas pa dang bkra shis pa rnams brjod par bya
NK002(kha)004:604: ba yin zhing / yang bsnyungs gnas dus gcig la mang po byed na /
NK002(kha)004:605: sbyor dngos gnyis sbrel ma gang rung 'grub rjes su rjes chog gcig gis chog go //
NK002(kha)004:606: rjes chog la gzungs rnams snga ma las mi nyung ba dang /
NK002(kha)004:607: bstod pa tshar bdun sogs long skabs dang bstun /
NK002(kha)004:608: 'di nyid sngags phyi pa yin pa'i lus ngag gi
NK002(kha)004:609: bya ba phra zhibs tsam yang bsrung dgos shing sbyor
NK002(kha)004:610: dngos rjes kyi thun sgang la ngag btang ba gnyid
NK002(kha)004:611: sogs kyi bar chod par gzungs kyi grangs ma rdzogs
NK002(kha)004:612: par gzhan du 'gro 'dug byas na de ma thag
NK002(kha)004:613: lags gnyis bkrus te gtsog pur 'dug cing /
NK002(kha)004:614: lag gnyis pus mo'i nang du 'ong bar byas /
NK002(kha)004:615: lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil du chu gtsang blugs pa
NK002(kha)004:616: g.yas pa'i sor mos blangs te kha la lan mang
NK002(kha)004:617: du byabs shing / kha dang sna mig rna ba
NK002(kha)004:618: zung dang lag pa ste ba mgo rnams su reg
NK002(kha)004:619: cing kha shar ba'i nye reg byas rjes /
NK002(kha)004:620: slar yang grangs kyi mgo nas brtsams ste bzlas brjod
NK002(kha)004:621: bskyar dgos pa sogs lag len cing sor ma song
NK002(kha)004:622: bar / tshul bzhin du bsgrub na mchog thun mong gi 'dod don 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
NK002(kha)004:623: gzhan phan blos drangs 'phags mchog bsnyen pa'i thabs //
NK002(kha)004:624: 'dir 'bad dge bas nyer mtshon bdag gzhan gyis //
NK002(kha)004:625: dus gsum bsags dge ma lus gcig bsdoms te //
NK002(kha)004:626: mkha' mnyam ma rnams gtan bde thob phyir bsngo //
NK002(kha)004:627: gnas skabs su yang bdud sde'i nyer 'tshe dang //
NK002(kha)004:628: rgud pa'i phyogs rtogs ma lus ngang gi zhi //
NK002(kha)004:629: tshe dpal chos dang thar pa'i 'tsho ba yi //
NK002(kha)004:630: bkra shis dam pa 'gro kun bsrung gyur cig /
NK002(kha)004:631: ces pa 'phags mchog thugs rje chen po'i bsgom bzlas
NK002(kha)004:632: kyi cho ga mkhas mchog rnams kyi mdzad pa las
NK002(kha)004:633: tshig gis spros pa nyung bar byas shing /
NK002(kha)004:634: bsgom bzlas rtsa ba bsgrub thabs rin 'byung du bzhugs pa gzhir bzhag /
NK002(kha)004:635: yan lag rigs mthun gzhan nas kha bskangs ste rang
NK002(kha)004:636: gzhan nyer mkho'i ched du phan sems kyi dpal kahthoga
NK002(kha)004:637: tu 'gyur med tshe dbang mchog grub pas nag 'gros
NK002(kha)004:638: su bkod pa'i dge bas sems can thams cad mkhyen
